name: 王正豪
objective: 網路搜尋引擎已經成為多數人重要的工具之一. 資訊檢索主要在探討, 如何有效的在大量文字及多媒體文件中搜尋使用者想要的相關資訊. 本課程將介紹資訊檢索的基本觀念, 檢索模型, 文字資訊檢索, 檢索結果評估, 索引與搜尋, 文件分類分群, 網頁搜尋, 以及各種多媒體檢索相關應用.
schedule:
Indexing (3 wks)
Basic text modeling and evaluation (2-3 wks)
Query processing and advanced models (2-3 wks)
Machine learning in IR (2-3 wk)
Web search (2-3 wks)
Advanced topics: CLIR, IE, social Web, ... (2 wks)
Term project presentation (2-3 wks)
scorePolicy:
Homework assignments and programming exercises: 40%
Mid-term exam: 25-30%
Term project and presentation: 30-35%
materials:
Textbook:
. Christopher D. Manning, Prabhakar Raghavan and Hinrich Schuetze, Introduction to Information Retrieval, Cambridge University Press. 2008. (available online at: http://www.informationretrieval.org/)
References:
. Ricardo Baeza-Yates and Berthier Ribeiro-Neto, Modern Information Retrieval: the concepts and technology behind search, 2nd ed. Addison-Wesley, 2011.
. Bruce Croft, Donald Metzler, and Trevor Strohman, Search Engines: Information Retrieval in Practice, Addison-Wesley, 2010.
. Stefan Buettcher, Charles L.A. Clarke, and Gordon V. Cormack, Information Retrieval: Implementing and Evaluating Search Engines, MIT Press, 2010.
Prerequisite:
. Basic knowledge of data structures and algorithms
. Programming experience is necessary for homeworks & projects
